as.description: The element or component the Combobox should render as.
as.description_zh: Combobox 应呈现为的元素或组件。

defaultValue.description: The default value when using as an uncontrolled component.
defaultValue.description_zh: 用作非受控零部件时的默认值。

by.type: keyof T | ((a: T, z: T) => boolean)
by.description:
Use this to compare objects by a particular field, or pass your own
comparison function for complete control over how objects are compared.
by.description_zh:
使用此函数按特定字段比较对象，或传递您自己的
比较功能，用于完全控制对象的比较方式。

name.description: The name used when using this component inside a form.
name.description_zh: 在表单中使用此组件时使用的名称。

nullable.description: Whether you can clear the combobox or not.

multiple.description: Whether multiple options can be selected or not.
multiple.description_zh: 是否可以选择多个选项。

:open.description: Whether or not the Combobox is open.

:disabled.description: Whether or not the Combobox is disabled.

slots.name: open
slots.description: Whether or not the combobox is open.

slots.name: disabled
slots.description: Whether or not the combobox is disabled.

slots.name: activeIndex
slots.description: The index of the active option or null if none is active.
slots.description_zh: active 选项的索引，如果没有活动选项，则为 null。

slots.name: activeOption
slots.description: The active option or null if none is active.
slots.description_zh: active 选项或 null（如果没有）处于活动状态。
